translation.en: The Four Horsemen are on the gallop.
You are a go to open the stable door. I repeat, open the stable door.
translation.ko: 마구간 개방을 승인한다 반복한다, 마구간을 열어라

translation.en: [woman] The payload is secure, and the Horsemen are en route.
I think it went. Go, baby.
What are you doing? Get in here. I feel it!
[soldier 1] Any idea what the hell we're hauling?
Why we need all this firepower to protect it?
[soldier 2] Could be anything from a briefcase nuke
translation.ko: 중요한 건가 보지 핵 가방 내지 헌법 원본쯤 되려나?

translation.en: to the original copy of the Constitution
translation.ko: 핵 가방 내지 헌법 원본쯤 되려나?

translation.en: but the one written in the Founding Fathers' blood.
translation.ko: 헌법 제정자들 피로 쓴 것 말이야

translation.en: I was thinking more like headpiece to the Staff of Ra
translation.ko: 그보단 태양신 라의 지팡이 장식 아닐까?

translation.en: or, uh, Amelia Earhart but alive.
-So, the less you know, the better. -True.
I got you a little present for making an honest woman out of me.
[chuckles] Okay. What? Wait, what are you talking about?
You are in trouble now, mister.
How about the lunar lander that was supposedly left on the moon?
translation.ko: 달에 남겨진 것으로 추정되는 달 착륙선

translation.en: [soldier 2] Yeah, I like the thematic extraterrestrial reference,
translation.ko: 그래, 우주와 관련된 물건일 수 있겠다

translation.en: seeing as we're just coming from, uh… Well, you know.
-So you're saying there's a chance. -Chance of what?
translation.ko: - 그러니까 가능성 있단 말이지? - 무슨 가능성?

translation.en: Chance we're hauling a… Well, you know.
but the Holy Grail of things we shouldn't be hauling.
translation.ko: 우리가 옮겨선 안 되는 성배 말이야

translation.en: You're gonna just make me say it out loud?
I honestly don't… I mean, you're being cryptic.
translation.ko: 그게 아니라, 뭘 말하는지 진짜 몰라서 그래

translation.en: All right, I'll say it. It's an alien.
-Let's get this thing out! -[soldier 3] Hurry up!
Never mind. They're dead in there. Let's get to this one. Come on.
-[soldier 6] Guys, get to payload two! -[soldier 7] Copy that!
Mothership, this is the Four Horsemen. Do you copy?
We're in an emergency situation, Mothership. Requesting support.
What is the nature of your emergency?
We've been in a serious accident, Mothership.
We got numerous fatalities for sure.
[woman] Copy that, Horsemen. Dispatching medevac now.
Keep your comms open while I contact the medevac.
[woman] Horsemen, what is the condition of the payload?
Looks like it's busted open in the middle of the highway.
translation.ko: 차 문이 열린 채 고속도로 한복판에 있다

translation.en: Gather whoever can walk or move and get away from the payload immediately.
translation.ko: 기동력이 있는 대원 모두를 화물에서 대피시켜라

translation.en: Wait, what are you telling me to do?
[woman] Shut the fuck up and listen to me. Get your men out of there, Horsemen.
translation.ko: 닥치고 잘 들어 거기서 벗어나란 말이야

translation.en: If they can't move, leave them. You understand?
Get away from that location now! Do you copy?
translation.ko: 당장 거길 벗어나! 내 말 들리나?

translation.en: -They said to stay away from it. -[soldier 9] What?
You heard what they said. We need to move now!
translation.ko: 통신 못 들었어? 당장 벗어나야 해!

translation.en: We need to go back. They need our help!
No. There is no "they." You understand? Everyone's fucked. Come on.
translation.ko: 도와주긴 누굴 도와줘? 모두 죽었어, 가자

translation.en: No, no, no. We can't stop. We got to keep moving.
We're far enough away now. It's okay.
-[growling in the distance] -It's getting further away. Let's go.
-Holy shit. Are you kidding me? -That really scared me. [chuckles]
[man] I saw what you did there.
[reporter] Thousands of protesters marched on the Capitol this morning
translation.ko: 오늘 아침 시위자 수천 명이 국회 의사당으로 행진했습니다

translation.en: in response to yesterday's historic Congressional vote
translation.ko: 어제 의회에서 그동안 논란이 돼 온

translation.en: that narrowly ratified the controversial proposal
translation.ko: 마지막 남은 좀비 무리를 소탕하자는 제안이

translation.en: to wipe out the last remains of the so-called Zombie Wars,
which drew to a dramatic end
with the US military suffering massive casualties
translation.ko: 미군은 좀비와의 충돌로 엄청난 사상자를 내며

translation.en: as Vegas was walled off with the zombies left inside to haunt the abandoned city.
This will mark the culmination of the president's efforts
to exterminate Las Vegas' undead population
by taking the extreme action of dropping a low-yield tactical nuclear bomb
on the city of Las Vegas in four days' time,
coinciding with sunset on the Fourth of July holiday.
The executive order has prompted the full evacuation
translation.ko: 이번 행정 명령으로 매캐런 격리 수용소는

translation.en: which has long been the target of civil rights groups
who have argued that no evidence of infection
has been detected in the camp.
May I talk to that gentleman, please?
translation.ko: 저분과 얘기 좀 할 수 있을까요?

translation.en: [man] Hey, Scott, you got a visitor.
It's not every man who saves the secretary of defense
translation.ko: 다른 사람도 아니고 식인 괴물 무리에서

translation.en: from a horde of flesh-eating monsters,
Mr. Tanaka, I am well aware of my situation.
translation.ko: 다나카 씨, 제 상황은 잘 압니다

translation.en: There's $200 million in the basement vault beneath the Strip.
translation.ko: 스트립 아래 지하 금고에 2억 달러가 있습니다

translation.en: Two hundred million the insurance company already reimbursed me for,

translation.ko: 세금을 물거나 추적당할 일 없는 돈이죠

translation.en: the government has already moved more than half of its military presence
I want you to put together a team and get it out.
50 million is yours to divvy up amongst whomever you take in with you.
translation.ko: 팀이 나눠 쓸 수 있게 5천만 달러를 드리겠습니다

translation.en: Think on it for the night.
[man on TV] You should just be happy
that this is essentially a government-funded health care solution
translation.ko: 질병 관리 대책으로 이 사태가 종식될 테니 "격리: 진실인가 공포 조성인가"

translation.en: that will put an end to all of this.
[woman] Come on, Sean. You know they're not infected.
translation.ko: 숀, 그 사람들은 감염되지 않은 거 알잖아요

translation.en: If they were, they would be zombies already.
translation.ko: 감염됐다면 벌써 좀비가 됐겠죠 그들은 정치범일 뿐이에요

translation.en: They're political prisoners, just people the government
translation.ko: 감염됐다면 벌써 좀비가 됐겠죠 그들은 정치범일 뿐이에요 정부는 그들이 거리를 활보하길 원치 않죠
정부는 그들이 거리를 활보하길 원치 않죠

translation.en: You know as well as I do, if you have questionable immigration status,
advocate for gay rights or abortion,
they have a temperature gun at your head
or dragging you out of your house or your car
under the guise of public safety.
[Sean] We've tested thousands of nukes in the Nevada desert.
translation.ko: 우린 네바다주 사막에서 핵 실험을 수천 번 했죠

translation.en: [man over PA] Attention detainees of Las Vegas McCarran quarantine camp.
translation.ko: 라스베이거스 매캐런 격리 수용소 거주자들은 주목하세요

translation.en: This facility is in an active evacuation.
translation.ko: 이 시설은 현재 소개가 진행 중입니다

translation.en: Board the shuttle bus for Barstow.
Have your current temporary health clearance card
to present to officials as you board the shuttle.
Reminder, shuttles will be leaving every 15 minutes.
-You guys excited for the big move? -Yeah!
Kate, let the kids finish packing.
Kate, I need you to promise me something.
In case anything happens to me in the next few days,
just make sure the kids make it out to Barstow. Okay?
What do you mean? What could happen?
Geeta, that is not an option.
[whispering] Kate, she helps people get in,
crack a slot machine, slip back out.
Before anyone even knows, you're gone.
That money is our ticket out of here,
or we'll be trapped in Barstow forever.
Listen, these guards, they don't give a shit.
translation.ko: 케이트, 수용소 경비들 알고도 모른 척해

translation.en: But for five grand, I can buy my way out, me and my kids.
translation.ko: 5천 달러가 있으면 우리 식구도 나갈 수 있다고

translation.en: I have to get the kids out by Friday,
and I will do whatever it takes to protect my family.
translation.ko: 내 가족을 지키기 위해서라면 난 뭐든 할 거야

translation.en: Geeta, people that go in there,
-Hey, wait, wait, wait, Geeta, come on. -Just let it go, okay?
What, you don't have anything better to do?
-The fuck you say to me, volunteer? -She didn't say anything.
translation.ko: - 방금 뭐랬지, 자원봉사자? - 아무 말 안 했어요

translation.en: Shut the fuck up! Shut the fuck up!
What? Were you saying something to me?
You know, the first sign of infection is belligerence
and actions outside of social norms.
Look at me and hold still.
employee shuttles leave in five minutes.
I could use my rectal thermometer.
You're down a couple of decimal points.
You sure you're feeling all right?
-You sure you're not infected? -I… I'm fine.
translation.ko: - 감염 안 된 거 확실해? - 이상 없어요

translation.en: I'm fine. I'm… I feel fine.
you're both within the margin of error, but watch it.
translation.ko: 둘 다 아직은 정상 범위지만 조심하는 게 좋아

translation.en: You better be on that bus, volunteer.
Do you know how easy it would be for him to make you disappear?
All he has to say is that you dropped a degree,
and nobody would question it, nobody.
translation.ko: 아무도 의심 안 하고 그대로 믿어

translation.en: I need you to promise me that you're not gonna do anything stupid.
Geeta, it's… it's not worth the risk.
[Scott] Mr. Tanaka, I'm in a tough spot.
I don't like you very much.
So I hate giving you the satisfaction of taking the job, but…
translation.ko: 만족감을 주긴 싫은데 일을 안 맡자니…

translation.en: [Tanaka] You'd best to gather your team.
You'll need a helicopter pilot and a safecracker.
I'm gonna text you an address.
[woman in Spanish] I hate to ask, but…
I have to take the kids to school, and if I can't get to my job--
translation.ko: 애들도 등교시켜야 하고 제때 출근 안 하면…

translation.en: Don't worry about it. Careful, I'm all greasy.
-Sharkey, give her the white loaner. -[Sharkey speaks Spanish]
[Scott] So you think it's a bad idea?
It's not a matter of "think." It's a matter of "is,"
and it is a bad goddamn idea.

translation.ko: - 그래서 안 한다? - 안 한다고는 안 했어

translation.en: That much I'm guessing your ass knew before you even walked in.
Everything we did, all those people we saved,
translation.ko: 우리가 한 모든 일과 우리가 구한 모든 사람

translation.en: But what if… what if just once,
we did something just for us?
What's the split? Even however many ways?
translation.ko: 어떻게 나눌 거야? 방법이 워낙 많아서 말이야

translation.en: Figured you, me, and Vanderohe will take 15 million each, assuming he'll do it.
translation.ko: 나, 당신, 밴더로 이렇게 셋이 1,500만씩 갖자 그 친구가 한다면

translation.en: Nobody needs to know our cut.
translation.ko: 우리 몫이 얼만지 알 필요 없지

translation.en: [chuckles] Who else is on your crazy-ass list?
translation.ko: 그 망할 명단에 또 누가 있어?

translation.en: [Vanderohe] So I see you had a visitor.
Talk to me. How'd it go?
[woman] Well, first time she's come to visit me in six months.
We can't make small talk for more than 35 minutes
without it turning into a fight.
I'm sure that she appreciates you, even if you don't realize it.
translation.ko: 그분도 어르신 마음을 알겠죠 못 느끼시겠지만요

translation.en: -Mmm. -I mean it. And if she doesn't… [whispers] …screw her.
You know, when we were in it, like, when we were really in it,
I never thought about the faces of all the countless monsters
translation.ko: 그 많은 괴물 얼굴을 생각해본 적이 없어요

translation.en: but now just realized, you know,
I don't know if being back in would be better or worse.
translation.ko: 그곳에 다시 가는 게 잘하는 짓인지

translation.en: God, I can't figure that out,
but I guess there is a chance that it could be…
They should have nuked Vegas in the early '90s, but…
-What the hell brings you here? -[Scott chuckles]
Sucks ass. What're you guys doing here?
-Well-- -We are putting together a crew for a job.
translation.ko: - 그게… - 함께 일할 팀을 꾸리고 있어

translation.en: you make two million dollars for one day's work.
[Peters] That's my share. Just for me?
Two million dollars if it pans out?
You don't want to know the risks or--
Why would I want to know the risks? Two million dollars? That's a lot of cash.
translation.ko: 그게 왜 궁금한데? 200만 달러면 엄청난 액수야

translation.en: Listen, I hate my life so deeply,
translation.ko: 있잖아, 난 내 인생이 진짜 싫거든

translation.en: if I had two million dollars,
You sure you don't want to know?
I bet it has something to do with a helicopter.
-I'm in. -[Scott] Thanks. Nice seeing you, bud.
Come on. This next one's on me.
That's it, baby. That's what I'm fuckin' talking about!
This is your boy, Mikey Guzman, taping live from East Las Vegas.
I counted at least five, but let me double-check. Hold on.

translation.ko: 빵, 맛이 어떠냐! 원 샷 투 킬!

translation.en: There are Reddit forums devoted to this guy.
-Swagger, man. Hell, yeah. -That's how it's done.
Make sure to like and subscribe.
Yo, that motherfucker has a Rolex. That's ten grand at least.
translation.ko: 롤렉스를 차고 있어 최소한 만 달러는 할 텐데

translation.en: What would you say about making 500 grand?
I'd say, "Who the hell do I gotta kill?"
You told me you needed a safecracker. Might be your missing piece.
translation.ko: 금고털이 필요하다며? 이 친구를 쓰면 될걸

translation.en: [Scott] How would you like to make 250 grand for one day's work?
translation.ko: 하루 일하고 25만 달러 버는 것 어때?

translation.en: This is like showing me a picture of Botticelli's Madonna of the Magnificat
and asking me if I want to fuck her.
Okay, the man who designed this wonderful work of art,
translation.ko: 좋아요, 이 멋진 예술품을 설계한 사람은

translation.en: for the final chapter in his namesake,
-Mmm. -[safecracker] Can it be opened and by me?
Watch your fingers, Mr. Big Hand.
But of the world's living locksmiths,
do I represent your greatest chance of opening it?
translation.ko: 이걸 열 가능성이 가장 큰 사람이 저냐고 묻는다면

translation.en: I can, with humility, say yes.
It's a doorway to another realm, my friends,
and providence has brought you to me.
translation.ko: 신의 섭리가 두 분을 제게 인도했죠

translation.en: -By the way, what's your name? -Scott Ward.
Scott, this is Damon. That's Chambers.
-They're with me. They'll be on my dime. -Okay.
translation.ko: - 성공하면 내 몫을 나눌 거예요 - 알았어

translation.en: -[Damon] How's it going? -Welcome to the team.
[Vanderohe] Scott, you want to tell me what's up with the kid? Look at him. No offense,
translation.ko: 스콧, 이 애송이는 뭐죠? 꼴을 봐요

translation.en: but he doesn't look like zombie killer material.
Hi, my name is Dieter, and I'm going to open what cannot be opened.
translation.ko: 안녕하세요, 디터예요 여는 게 불가능한 걸 열 생각이죠

translation.en: [Scott] No, we need the kid to open the safe.
We lose him, we got nothing.
Let's go, guys. Bring it in.
[Tanaka] Lovely to have you all gathered here today.
There is an abandoned rescue helicopter on top of the north tower, Sodom.
translation.ko: 북쪽 타워 소돔 꼭대기에 구조 헬기가 버려져 있죠

translation.en: this should be a simple in-and-out.
[Tanaka] You will enter the city with a 32-hour window.
should be no problem for a gang of tough hombres such as yourselves.
translation.ko: 여러분 같은 터프가이들한텐 문제가 되지 않을 겁니다

translation.en: Wait, wait, wait, wait, wait, wait!
How precisely do we do the zombie killing?
[Scott] Is there anybody else here who hasn't killed a zombie?
translation.ko: 또 좀비 죽여본 적 없는 사람?

translation.en: Well, we all know the basics.
Zombies, shamblers, the undead, whatever you wanna call them,
translation.ko: 좀비, 어기적, 언데드 뭐라 부르든 상관없어

translation.en: when it comes to killing them, it's all about the brain.
One comes at you, shoot it in the brain. It's that simple. Any questions?
translation.ko: 총으로 머리를 쏘면 돼 간단해, 질문 있나?

translation.en: Yes. What if I took a big rock and smashed it into the head?
translation.ko: 네, 큰 돌로 머리를 내리찍는 건요?

translation.en: Yeah. Yeah, that, uh… that also would still be targeting the brain, so that would work.
translation.ko: 그래, 뇌를 훼손하는 한 그것도 통할 거야

translation.en: [Tanaka] From there, you move down the Strip.
You'll reach the casino in less than two hours.
You go in and find the generator.
The safe, beneath the south tower, Gomorrah…
is at the end of a hallway.
There, you'll find several nonlethal deterrents.
translation.ko: 비살상용 함정이 여러 개 설치돼 있으니

translation.en: You'll have to find a way to trigger them.

translation.ko: 그 사이 우리의 용감한 정비공 겸 조종사는

translation.en: Like a surgeon or a painter,
his masterpiece rendered in barely audible clicks.
translation.ko: 희미한 딸각 소리와 함께 걸작품을 탄생시키고

translation.en: Finally, she succumbs to the sheer dominance of his gentle touch.
translation.ko: 그 부드러운 손길의 이끌림에 금고가 완전히 굴복합니다

translation.en: Then, all you have to do is load the money on the helicopter
and fly off into the sunset.
…a full day before the nuke ever leaves the launchpad.
translation.ko: 핵폭탄이 발사대를 떠나기 하루 전에 끝납니다

translation.en: We're not allowed to say that anymore. It's "lemon squeezy" now.
translation.ko: 그건 어폐가 좀 있어요 일본어 못하는 일본인도 있거든요

translation.en: I think it's fine if he's Japanese-y.
Oh. Okay. Good job. Good job.
Wait, wait, wait, wait, wait. Hold on. This is the real plan? It's zombies?
Yeah, bro, what's going on? I thought you were cool with it.
translation.ko: 그래, 왜? 문제 될 거 없잖아

translation.en: You were always talking about how, if you saw a zombie, you'd fuck his shit up.
translation.ko: 좀비를 보면 인정사정 안 봐준다고 늘 그러지 않았어?

translation.en: This is crazy. You all are gonna die.
[Scott] All right, team, grab your load-out bags. See you at 6:00 a.m. sharp.
translation.ko: 좋아, 다들 장비 챙겨서 새벽 6시에 칼같이 모여

translation.en: My name's Martin. I'm Mr. Tanaka's head of security.
Anything you need, you talk to me.
I can access any hardware you might want.
I'll also be accompanying you on this job
because of my extensive knowledge of the casino.
[Tanaka] How're you feeling? [Scott] You're insane. You know that, right?
translation.ko: - 예감이 어때요? - 본인이 미친 거 아시죠?

translation.en: But if it's a choice between dying on the Strip
and spending another day flipping patties at the Lucky Boy,
I'll gamble on a few million.
Have you given any thought to how you'll get in?
[woman over PA] Recent arrivals require a full health inspection.
translation.ko: 최근에 도착한 분들은 정밀 건강검진을 받아야 합니다

translation.en: Barstow Quarantine Center is a zero-tolerance facility.
translation.ko: 바스토 격리 센터는 무관용 정책을 따릅니다

translation.en: Without a green health clearance sticker on your key card,
translation.ko: 카드키에 건강을 증명하는 녹색 스티커가 없는 분은

translation.en: you will not be permitted in common areas.
-What are you doing here? -I need to talk to you.
translation.ko: 여긴 왜 온 거예요? - 얘기 좀 하자, 잠깐만 - 싫어요

translation.en: -No. No! -Wait. Whoa! Just hear me out. Hear me out.
Look. I know this is gonna sound crazy.
But do one thing for me.
Do this one thing, and I can give you $15 million.
If you do this one thing for me, I will.
I know this is not gonna make up for what I did…
translation.ko: 돈으로 내 행동을 용서받으려는 것 아니야

translation.en: -[scoffs] -…or what type of father I was.
With $15 million, you can help these people.
translation.ko: 하지만 그 돈으로 이 사람들 도와줄 수 있잖아

translation.en: You can go back to school, do whatever you want.
translation.ko: 공부도 계속하고 네가 원하는 걸 할 수 있어

translation.en: Whatever you do with this money, I know will be the right thing.
translation.ko: 너라면 그 돈으로 뭘 하든 허투루 쓰지 않겠지

translation.en: Not bad for your first time.
I understand what beautiful little machine. [chuckles]
Hey, don't point a gun at me.
I swear to God, if this whole mission
is some insane way for you to reconnect with your daughter--
It's not, all right? Trust me.
She's a volunteer at the camp. She's got connections.
She's just giving us a ride into the quarantine zone.
translation.ko: 격리 구역까지만 우릴 태워다 줄 거야

translation.en: You really think I'd take her inside the city?
translation.ko: 내가 쟤를 도시 안으로 데려갈 것 같아?
"경고 - 이곳은 격리 구역으로 미국의 치외 법권 지역입니다"

translation.en: Hey, how you doing? I don't think we've officially met. My name's Martin.
translation.ko: 정식으로 인사를 못 했네요 난 마틴이에요

translation.en: Don't talk to me. I don't trust these people, especially you.
translation.ko: 난 이 사람들 안 믿으니까 말 걸지 말아요, 당신은 더더욱요

translation.en: -Oh. -You stay the hell away from me.
[man over PA] Detainees at the Las Vegas McCarran Quarantine Center,
translation.ko: 라스베이거스 매캐런 격리 센터 거주자들은 주목하세요

translation.en: this facility will be closed by the end of the day. No personnel…
translation.ko: 해당 시설은 오늘 폐쇄됩니다 센터 직원은 한 명도…

translation.en: Does coyote girl have a name?
You can just call me that if you want.
All right, I'll leave you guys to it.
I'll meet you outside Barstow in 24 hours.
[Kate] Hey. Hey, hey, hey, hey, hey. What's wrong?
You don't think I need something bigger?
If I give you something bigger than that, you're already dead.
translation.ko: 더 큰 거 주면 넌 이미 죽은 목숨이야

translation.en: Give me a fucking break. Really?
Dieter, try not to piss Van off.
-What did you do? -What do you mean?
translation.ko: - 무슨 짓을 한 거예요? - 무슨 소리야?

translation.en: -Yeah. I took her in. Her and two others. -[gasps]
translation.ko: 그래, 그랬어 다른 두 여자도 같이

translation.en: I take a lot of people in. They need that money to get out of here.
translation.ko: 내가 안내한 게 한둘이야? 수용소를 벗어나려면 돈이 필요하니까

translation.en: -They know the risks. -[Kate] She has two kids!
Listen, if I knew she had kids, I wouldn't have taken her.
translation.ko: 애가 있는 줄 알았으면 거절했을 거야

translation.en: They went ahead. I… I hung back.
They never came out. I'm sorry.
I waited, Kate, as long as I could, but at the end of the day--

translation.ko: 그건 안 돼 - 갈래요 - 말 들어, 안 돼

translation.en: We're not having this conversation. You're not coming.
There are two kids whose mother is lost in there.
translation.ko: 아이 둘이 고아가 될 지경에 처했어요

translation.en: Two kids that I help look out for.
Well, tell us what she looks like. We'll look out for her.
-You think I trust you to do that? -Kate!
translation.ko: - 그 말을 믿을 것 같아요? - 케이트!
- 절대로 안 돼! - 부탁하는 거 아녜요!

translation.en: I'm telling you what's gonna happen.
Listen to me. As someone who's seen what this looks like,
this is not a path you wanna go down. I'm not gonna let you try.
translation.ko: 너무 위험해, 절대 허락할 수 없다

translation.en: We'll look for your friend. I'll see you when we get out.
translation.ko: 네 친구는 우리가 찾아볼 테니까 알겠어?

translation.en: I can go in with you, and you can keep me safe.
-Kate. -Or-- Or… I'll just sneak in after you,
translation.ko: - 케이트 - 아니면 나중에 몰래 들어갈 거예요

translation.en: If we see your friend, great.
But you are not to run off looking for her. This is life or death.
translation.ko: 찾으러 다녀선 안 돼 이건 생사가 달린 일이야

translation.en: And if you screw around, some of these people are gonna die.
So you are never, ever to leave my sight.
translation.ko: 그러니 내 시야를 절대로 벗어나선 안 돼

translation.en: Those are my terms. Are we clear?
[officer] You having a good time? What's he talking about?
The bomb that's coming to kill you? Is that what you're talking about?
translation.ko: 널 죽이려고 폭탄을 투하한다고? 그런 소리야?

translation.en: [man over PA] This is a mandatory evacuation zone.
-We're going to need one more guy. -For what?
translation.ko: - 한 사람이 더 필요해요 - 뭐 하게요?

translation.en: You don't know what it's like in there. Not anymore.
-The team's big enough-- -Trust me. We need another person.
translation.ko: - 팀은 이미… - 날 믿어요, 한 사람 더 필요해요

translation.en: What the hell's going on here?
I don't fucking get it. Why the fuck would she bring him?
translation.ko: 이해가 안 돼요 저 망할 놈은 왜 끌어들였죠?

translation.en: Honey, easy with the f-bombs, okay?
We're about to march into a sea of dead people and commit grand larceny.
translation.ko: 우리 지금 좀비들 뚫고 강도질하러 가는 거거든요

translation.en: -But excuse me for swearing. -That's for you.
We're gonna have some fun, yeah?
I'm telling you, you got the right guy for this.
And also, if you happen to get scared in there or nervous,
I want you to stay close to me.
Don't ever touch my saw again, okay? Don't ever talk to her again…
translation.ko: 다시는 내 톱에 손대지 말아요 쟤한테 말도 걸지 말고

translation.en: Hey. It's not too late to go back.
Weren't smart enough to get out of the sun.
translation.ko: 멍청하게 햇빛이 있을 때 밖으로 나왔거든요

translation.en: You should see what happens when it rains.
For a few hours, they all come back to life.
translation.ko: 몇 시간 젖고 나면 다시 살아나죠

translation.en: You sure know your way around here.
How much you know about how these things operate?
[Chambers] Holy shit. What is all this?
[Lilly] Where the police and military finally fell.
-What the hell is that? -Get behind the car! Go!
She was one of Siegfried and Roy's.
She guards the beginning of their territory.

translation.ko: - 여기 말고 다른 길은 없어요? - 없어요

translation.en: Hey, Cummings. Let me see your gun for a second.
I would say I was hoping I wouldn't have to do that, but I'd be lying.
translation.ko: 거짓말 안 할게 이 순간을 고대했어

translation.en: -What are you talking about? -What is she doing?
She just shot me. Shoot her!
They'll know we're here. They won't care so long as we play by their rules.
translation.ko: 우리가 온 걸 놈들이 알 거예요 규칙만 지키면 무사할 수 있어요

translation.en: -Rules? De qué habla esta pendeja? -[Guzman] O sea, está loca.
If we wanna go further, we have to make a trade.
Yes. An offering to show our subservience.
translation.ko: 그래요, 복종의 뜻으로 제물을 바치는 거죠
- 좀비는 사고를 못 해요 - 이 계집을 쏴요!

translation.en: -If they come, we kill them. -[Lilly] You don't understand.
translation.ko: - 나타나면 죽이면 되죠 - 모르는 소리 그만해요

translation.en: -They're not what you think they are. -[Cummings] Shoot her in the face!

translation.ko: 빌어먹을! 어기적 좀비를 말하는 게 아녜요

translation.en: They just move and eat. But we're talking about the other ones.
translation.ko: 돌아다니며 배만 채울 뿐인데 난 다른 좀비를 말하는 거예요
- 알파 좀비 - 맞아요 더 영리하고 더 빠르죠

translation.en: They're organized. Straight out of your fucking nightmares.
You all keep talking about the city like it's their prison.
They won't mind us poking around the outside so long as we play by their rules.
translation.ko: 자기들 규칙을 따르는 한 우릴 상관하지 않을 거예요

translation.en: -[Cummings] Oh my God! -We're moving into the heart of it now.
I have a mother. I love her.
Well, everyone has a mom, you cunt,
but not everyone is an abuser lording power over quarantined women.
translation.ko: 그렇다고 다들 격리 구역 여자한테 권력을 휘두르진 않지

translation.en: [Cummings sobbing] She's lying! That's not true.
[Lilly] Shut your mouth. I've seen what you've done to those women.
translation.ko: 닥쳐, 네가 그곳 여자들한테 어떻게 했는지 다 봤어

translation.en: [Cummings] Oh my God! That's not true at all.

translation.ko: - 맙소사, 안 돼! - 그 여자가 와요

translation.en: -She? What's she? -[Cummings] No, please. We bonded. Please.
translation.ko: - 그 여자? 그게 누군데요? - 안 돼요, 풀어줘요, 제발요

translation.en: No. No, no, no. Don't trust her.
translation.ko: 안 돼요, 그 여자 믿지 말아요

translation.en: Help me. Don't go. No, we're a team.
translation.ko: 도와줘요, 가지 말아요 우린 한 팀이잖아요

translation.en: Help. Shoot this! What the fuck is this thing?
translation.ko: 도와줘요, 총을 쏴요! 이게 대체 뭐야?
내 말 들어봐, 안 돼, 안녕

translation.en: Come on. Help me, help me, help me, help me.
No! No, no, no, no, no.
Don't do it. Just stay away.
Go away. Go over there. Go over there.
-[Scott] You ever seen her kill anyone? -[Lilly] Couple times.
translation.ko: - 저 여자, 사람도 죽여요? - 네, 한두 번 봤어요

translation.en: [Lilly] My theory, this started with one of them, an original.
translation.ko: 내 생각엔 저들 중 하나가 최초의 좀비였지 싶어요

translation.en: [Lilly] Whoever that is, if he bites you--
-[Vanderohe] Then you become an alpha. -[Lilly] Exactly.
Looks like they're taking him to the Olympus.
Good. Now we know where not to go.
[Lilly] I've never figured out exactly how it works.
All I know is they take you in there, and you come out like one of them,
translation.ko: 올림퍼스로 끌려간 사람은 모두 알파가 돼서 나왔어요

translation.en: -So, they're taking him there to turn him. -[Lilly] Yes.
Scott, that could be where Geeta is.
Kate, we've already talked about this.
-[Kate] We have time. -[Scott] It's not an option.
translation.ko: - 시간 있잖아요 - 절대로 안 돼 알았어요

translation.en: So, the shithead buys us passage, and we keep going?
translation.ko: 통행세를 냈으니 이대로 가면 되는 거예요?

translation.en: Well, yeah. The shithead should buy us some goodwill,
but I'm not about to flaunt it by walking on their streets.
If we want to go further, we go indoors.
Hey, uh, has there been any thought given to triage?
Well, I mean, obviously, the German is the most important person
translation.ko: 물론 가장 중요한 사람은 저 독일인 친구지

translation.en: but barring that, it's got to be me, right?
Because without me, you can't fly the chopper out of here.
So that would make me second most important.
And I don't know if you two are tied for third or whatever,
translation.ko: 그리고 세 번째가 너희 둘인지는 모르겠지만

translation.en: but I'm certainly more important than that guy.
translation.ko: 확실한 건 내가 저 친구보단 중요하다는 거야

translation.en: Sorry. I didn't know you were listening. I am way…
translation.ko: 미안, 듣고 있는지 몰랐어 그리고 저 사람…

translation.en: [chuckles] Okay, I am definitely more important than that guy.
translation.ko: 누가 봐도 내가 저 사람보단 중요하지

translation.en: You know why he was hired?
He was hired to keep tabs on us
for when we open the safe, that we didn't take the money and run.
translation.ko: 금고에 있는 돈을 우리가 슬쩍 못 하게 말이야

translation.en: I'm not trying to be the bad guy,
What? What's everybody looking at me for?
It's a free country. People can look at whoever they want.
translation.ko: 자유 국가니까 누구든 원하는 걸 볼 수 있죠

translation.en: Actually, it's not a free country. We're not in America anymore.
translation.ko: 자유 국가 아니에요 여긴 이제 미국이 아니니까요 못 들었어요?
여긴 이제 미국이 아니니까요 못 들었어요?

translation.en: Which technically makes it an even freer country, right?
translation.ko: 그러니 전보다 훨씬 더 자유롭죠 안 그래요?

translation.en: What the fuck is this? [shouting indistinctly]
Hey. Let me talk to you for a second.
-I can help you. Just let me-- -[snarls loudly]
Let's just talk turkey for a second. I--
Don't shine the light in their eyes.
I've seen this before. They're hibernating.
If we can't see them, how are we supposed to move forward?
Why? You want to check out my ass?
No. I don't trust you to have our backs if shit goes bad.
translation.ko: 아뇨, 일이 생겨도 우리를 구할 것 같지 않아서요

translation.en: I've been watching you, and you're up to something.
translation.ko: 내가 지켜봤는데 꿍꿍이가 있는 게 분명해요

translation.en: When we all get to the casino,
I think we need to have a little conversation
about what exactly your role is here.
-Where's Chambers? -[Martin] She was right behind me.
translation.ko: - 체임버스 어딨죠? - 뒤에 따라오는 줄 알았는데요

translation.en: -What happened? What did you do? -I didn't do anything.
translation.ko: - 뭐예요? 무슨 짓을 한 거죠? - 난 아무 짓 안 했어요

translation.en: She started shooting. I wasn't close to her.
translation.ko: 갑자기 쏘더군요 난 가까이 있지도 않았어요

translation.en: Bullshit! She was back there with you! I know she was!
She's gone! Come on. Leave her! She's dead!
translation.ko: 가망 없어요! 갑시다 저 여자는 죽은 목숨이에요

translation.en: We gotta move. Come on, move!
There's no way Geeta's alive, right?
I mean, look at these things.
Don't be so sure. I brought a guy in once.
Lost sight of him. Had to leave him. I thought he was dead.
Then three days later, he came walking back out.
[Lilly] Said they took him to the Olympus.
Shoved him in a room with two other people.
translation.ko: 다른 두 사람과 한 방에 갇혀 있었는데

translation.en: The leader, he came for them one by one.
If my guy hadn't escaped, he would have been next.
translation.ko: 자기 차례가 되기 직전에 빠져나온 거지

translation.en: So that's a pretty common theme for you?
Do you think I enjoy having to leave people?
I'm doing what I can to make things right.
Yeah, another set of blueprints to the safe.
translation.ko: 그래, 금고 청사진이 한 부 더 있군

translation.en: Tanaka had other teams here before us.
Do you know anything about this?
Peters, get up to the roof.
Get that chopper running as fast as possible. Cruz, go with her.
translation.ko: 최대한 빨리 헬기를 가동해 크루스, 같이 가

translation.en: Look, I'm excited to see my friends again, okay?
Me and the coyote will do a perimeter check, board up the doors.
translation.ko: 난 코요테랑 주변을 확인한 뒤 문을 차단할게요

translation.en: Yeah. Kate and I are gonna find the generators.
Backup gennie's on the third-floor roof. That's gonna be your safer bet.
translation.ko: 비상 발전기가 3층 옥상에 있죠 그걸 쓰는 게 확실할 겁니다

translation.en: Van, get Dieter down to the vault.
Dieter, access card for the outer doors to the safe and the service elevators.
translation.ko: 디터, 출입 카드를 줄게요 금고 외부 출입문과 직원용 승강기를 탈 때 필요하죠

translation.en: It's by the cashiers windows that way.
This should get you inside. Here.
[chuckles] That one's mine. I got another one.
translation.ko: 이건 내 거고, 하나 더 있어요

translation.en: All right. Everybody knows what they're doing. Let's get it done.
translation.ko: 각자 맡은 역할이 뭔지 알지? 시작하자고 그러죠

translation.en: No la vayas a cagar, my friend.
Spend all his money on that fucking miniature?
translation.ko: 이 장난감에 가진 돈 다 썼다고?

translation.en: Guilt finally get the better of you?
One too many out there to die?
Matter of fact, yes, it has.
did you shoot her in the leg too?
I've never left anyone I didn't have to
translation.ko: 난 함부로 버리고 가는 사람 아녜요

translation.en: You have no idea what I've seen in those camps.
What those people have to do to survive.
At least within these walls, the rules are clear.
translation.ko: 그래도 이 안에선 규칙이 분명하기나 하죠

translation.en: You don't see them fucking each other over.
The second one's just for fun.
[Scott] You understand that I had to do it, right?
translation.ko: 나로선 어쩔 수 없었다는 거 알지?

translation.en: You know, all those things they were saying… about me after.
translation.ko: 다들 나에 관해 뭐라고 했는지 알 거야

translation.en: -I want to make sure you know I loved her. -Yeah.
If I ever made it seem like that wasn't the case, I'm sorry.
You did what you had to do.
She was one of them. It…
You think that's why I haven't been talking to you all these years?
-Seemed like the logical assumption. Yeah. -[scoffs] No.
What you did and what happened to her,
I never blamed you for that, ever.
translation.ko: 원망한 적은 단 한 번도 없어요

translation.en: Well, I don't… I don't get it.
If it wasn't what happened, what the hell was it?
It's not the fact that… you killed my mother.
It's that you never showed up after, okay?
You didn't call. You didn't visit.

translation.ko: 그날 일에 관한 얘기도 안 하고

translation.en: It's 'cause every time I looked at you,
And then when I tried to come back around, you just…
You seemed like you didn't want me there, so I assumed I should stay gone.
translation.ko: 날 원치 않는 것 같더구나 그래서 거리를 뒀지

translation.en: You know, maybe there's a chance we could still…
Maybe you could look into college somewhere.
We shouldn't need money. I could open a restaurant.
translation.ko: 우린 돈 필요 없잖아 난 식당이나 열지, 뭐

translation.en: I was thinking artisan grilled cheese sandwiches.
translation.ko: 수제 그릴드 치즈 샌드위치를 팔까 해

translation.en: [clears throat] I don't know. It's a… it's a nice idea, but…
I've spent so long hating you that I can't just turn that off.
translation.ko: 아빠를 너무 오래 미워해서 갑자기 될지 모르겠어요

translation.en: -That came out meaner than I meant it to. -[clears throat] No, it's all right.
Let's just get this done. [clears throat]
I got the bride. I got the bride.
Not zombie-killing material, my ass, Mr. Vanderohe.
translation.ko: 나더러 좀비 킬러처럼 안 생겼다고 한 게 누구더라?

translation.en: You've been here in the dark waiting for me.
There's another team of grave robbers.
translation.ko: 도굴 팀이 한 팀 더 있었어요

translation.en: They tried to cut their way in.
No, no, no, no, no, no, no.
Oh, no. All they managed to do is to screw up the card reader.
[Vanderohe] Is it another team, or is it us, Dieter?
I mean, look at them. It's us.
It could be us in another timeline,
fighting and dying, fighting and dying. And Tanaka…
And we, you, me, Guz, and the rest of the team,
translation.ko: 우리, 너, 나, 구스 그리고 나머지 팀원들은

translation.en: simply pawns in some perverse play
where we're destined to repeat our failures.
That's where the first pressure trigger is.
translation.ko: 첫 번째 함정 압력에 의해 작동되죠

translation.en: It's some kind of a booby trap, trust me.
If we could find something to trigger it…
By the way, I love your hair.
Easy, easy, easy. Hey, hey, hey.
You said you just needed a vial of her blood.
You know how much the whole head of one of these things is worth to my boss,
translation.ko: 이 머리가 우리 보스나 정부에 얼마나 큰 가치가 있는지 알기나 해요?
얼마나 큰 가치가 있는지 알기나 해요?

translation.en: In the right hands, this is the power to make more of them.
translation.ko: 제대로 된 손에 들어가면 좀비를 더 만들 힘이 되죠

translation.en: The power to control your own zombie army.
[Lilly] This isn't what we agreed to.
Well, you want your deal or not?
So you keep your goddamn mouth shut.
Why? They gonna come looking for her if she doesn't radio back to base?
translation.ko: 왜요? 이게 무전 안 하면 찾으러 오기라도 한대요?

translation.en: Her death cry. They'll have heard it.
Once they find her body, our trade is off.
Come on, go get it. That's right.
All right, here we go. You can taste it.
-It's not the meat, it's the heat. -[Dieter] Okay.
translation.ko: - 인육이 아닌 온도에 끌린 거였어 - 좋아요

translation.en: And the deterrent should be releasing
That was supposed to be nonlethal.
-That has to be illegal, right? -Good old Tanaka.
So is that it, Dieter, huh? Is it safe now?
Oh, come on, Guz. It was just getting fun.
Can you help me, Mr. Vanderohe? [gags]
it will be either destruction or renewal.
That's heavy, brother. But I dig it.
The decision came down to the wire, but ultimately, the president caved
translation.ko: 마지막 순간에 결정되긴 했지만 독립 기념일에는

translation.en: to the pressures to move the date of the bombing off of the holiday.
translation.ko: 폭탄을 투하하지 말라는 압력에 대통령이 굴복한 듯합니다

translation.en: This marked a reversal of his earlier position
that dropping the nuke on the Fourth would be, quote,
"Really cool and the ultimate fireworks show,"
and quote, "Actually kind of patriotic if you think about it."
Due to fears that mounting anger from humanitarian groups
would cause the bombing to be postponed indefinitely,
translation.ko: 폭탄 투하가 무기한 연기될 것이란 우려가 발생하자

translation.en: the administration has made the dramatic choice
to not postpone the bombing but rather to move it up by a full 24 hours.
[newscaster] The scheduled drop time now coming at sunset tonight.
translation.ko: 예정된 투하 시간은 오늘 해 질 녘입니다

translation.en: [Maria] Are you fucking kidding me? What?
[newscaster] Keep checking back with us here.
[Martin] Think that kid has that safe open yet?
Oh, nice. I'm glad they decided to move the nuclear bomb up.
I was getting kind of antsy.
[Scott] We've got about 90 minutes before this place is dust.
Good. I actually found a pool.
Gotta even this shit out. You know what I'm talking about?
translation.ko: 골고루 잘 익히는 중이지 뭔 말인지 알지?

translation.en: It's a little slower than we thought, but… we're close.
translation.ko: 생각보다 늦어지곤 있지만 거의 다 됐어

translation.en: All right. I'm just giving it a wash and wax, so hurry up.
translation.ko: 좋아, 반짝반짝 잘 닦아둘 테니 서둘러

translation.en: -Hey, Dieter. How's that safe coming? -[Dieter grunts] Scheisse!
You see this? The four locks?
It's a rotating randomization mechanism, right, Mr. Vanderohe?
You just made me mess up, and now we're back to ground zero.
translation.ko: 당신이 방해해 처음부터 다시 해야 해요

translation.en: If you mess it up again, it locks forever.
translation.ko: 한 번 더 실수하면 영영 못 열어요

translation.en: Okay, how long will it take you to open it?
Mr. Vanderohe, can you please keep your team quiet?
I need to concentrate. Thank you.
Thirty minutes, that's not bad. Right?
Nuclear bomb drops on us in an hour and 20 minutes.
Right, which gives us an hour to get to the helicopter and get out of here.
translation.ko: 그럼 헬기까지 가서 여기를 뜰 시간이 1시간 있는 거야

translation.en: What's the alternative? Run for the edge of the city?
translation.ko: 대안은 있어? 시 경계를 향해 달린다?

translation.en: I don't think we'll make it.
No, we don't need an alt. We trust him.
translation.ko: 아니, 대안은 필요 없어 디터를 믿잖아

translation.en: Yeah, no, no, no. He's got it.
-Our guy Dieter can do it. -[Dieter] Ah, fuck.
It's probably how the last team got in and how those shamblers got down here.
translation.ko: 어기적들이 있는 거로 봐서 지난번 팀은 이리로 왔나 봐

translation.en: Hey, what do you think about tofu?
I was thinking, can make anything out of tofu.
translation.ko: 두부로 만들 수 있는 게 무궁무진하잖아

translation.en: Tofu burgers, tofu fries, tofu milkshake, tofu cheesecake.
translation.ko: 두부 버거, 두부튀김 두부 밀크셰이크, 두부 치즈케이크

translation.en: I don't know what that is. Tofu cheesecake. I don't know.
I thought maybe, since everyone's going vegan now, you know.
Humans are figuring out they're not at the top of the food chain.
translation.ko: 먹이사슬의 정상은 우리 자리가 아닌 걸 안 거지

translation.en: -[Scott] All good up there? -Uh, yeah. We're secure.
How much we got in the cart?
-[Guzman] Imagine what's in the safe. -Check this out.
That is the most money I've ever held in my hand.
As soon as that door opens, it's a rounding error,
translation.ko: 금고 문을 열고 안을 들여다보는 순간

translation.en: I'll take it if you don't want it.
No, that's cool. I got it.
I've done it. I've done it.
Wait, what? You did it? Like… like, "did it" did it?
[Dieter] The only thing that's left is to turn the wheel.
As it was inevitable that we won.
Mr. Vanderohe, would you do me the honor?
All right, come on. Let's go, guys.
We got about 20 minutes before this place is dust.
-Let's pack this shit up and go. -[Dieter] Yeah.
[Scott] Hey, Vanny, where's your head at now, bud?
[Vanderohe] It's in a good place, Scott.
It's in a good fucking place.
-[Vanderohe] Let's go, Guz. Let's get it. -[chuckles excitedly]
Well, not just like old times
Hey, you can talk to me. What's up?
translation.ko: 이봐, 나한테 못 할 말이 어딨어?

translation.en: You're really stupid. You know that?
translation.ko: 당신 진짜 바보 같은 거 알지?

translation.en: [Scott] Did I miss something? 'Cause we're richer--
I didn't come here for the money, dumb shit.
translation.ko: 돈 때문에 온 거 아냐, 멍청아

translation.en: I mean, don't get me wrong, I'll take the millions.
But… I came here for you.
I thought we could have had something, but then you just… went away.
translation.ko: 우리 관계가 특별한 줄 알았는데 어느 순간 갑자기 사라져 버렸지

translation.en: It's just that seeing you again is just… bringing it all back.
translation.ko: 그냥 당신을 다시 보니까 아픔이 되살아나

translation.en: And it's not that I've been waiting. You know, I… I haven't. [sniffles]
translation.ko: 그렇다고 내가 당신을 기다린 건 아냐

translation.en: I thought I'd fucked that up… forever.
I'm realizing that I've been wrong about everything.
About you and me, me and Kate.
-Hey, is Kate down there? -[Guzman] Not here!
Goddamn it! I know where she went.
[Maria] Scott, listen to me. Let's think this through.
-Wait for the rest-- -There's nothing to think about.
translation.ko: - 다들 올 때까지 기다리자 - 생각할 게 뭐가 있어?

translation.en: I know where she went. She's my daughter. I'll get her back.
translation.ko: 어디 갔는지 알아 내 딸이니 내가 데려올 거야

translation.en: I'm not gonna let you go out there alone.
-[Lilly] Hey, what are you doing? -[Martin] Whoo!
Martin, let us out of here.
[chuckling] Oh, my God, I got you twice. I got you twice.
Tanaka doesn't give a shit about the money.
What's in this bag is worth ten times what's in that vault.
translation.ko: 이 가방 안에 든 게 10배는 더 가치 있거든

translation.en: Okay, I'm gonna go kill that dumbass pilot,
now that she's fixed the chopper, fly myself out of here.
translation.ko: 헬기를 고쳐 놨을 테니 나 혼자 이곳을 뜰 거야

translation.en: All right. We'll make a run for that elevator. Get up to the roof.
Martin said he'd let everyone out of the camps if I helped him.
translation.ko: 마틴이 협조하면 수용소 사람들 다 내보내 준댔어요

translation.en: Come on. Let's go. Let's go.
-I know what I'm doing. Just go! -[snarls]
One more step, and I'll blow her head off.
translation.ko: 한 발짝만 더 다가오면 머리를 날려 버릴 거야

translation.en: Scott, was that a zombie in a goddamn cape?
translation.ko: 스콧, 그 좀비 망토 두른 거 맞아?

translation.en: Kate's at the Olympus. We got to go get her.
translation.ko: 케이트가 올림퍼스에 있어 데리러 가야 해

translation.en: How much time do we have?
You son of a bitch! If we do this…
-[Geeta] Oh, my God, Kate. Oh, Kate. -Oh, my God.
Kate, you came back for me.
-Are you bitten? -He hasn't gotten to us yet.
Okay, we need to go right now. Come with me. Come with me.
Wait, you guys… you guys hear that?
I know, I know. Somewhere between leaving your ass and saving my own,
Get in. Come on, let's go.
Hey. Hey, it's not so bad.
It's fine. It's not as deep…
You don't have to do that.
I've been thinking a lot, Kate.
It's got to be lobster rolls.
'Cause everybody loves a goddamn lobster roll, right?
Everyone loves a goddamn lobster roll.
Hey, I got something for you.
I know it's not millions, but
this should get Geeta's kids out of the camp for good.
translation.ko: 기타 애들을 수용소에서 빼낼 수 있을 거야

translation.en: You go and make it right.
I'm so goddamn proud of you.
You're not a coward. [sniffling] You're not a coward.
You're the bravest man I know.

translation.ko: - 네? - 우리 딸 얼굴 좀 보자

translation.en: Hey! ♪ But you see, it's not me It's not my family ♪
[Vanderohe] I would like to rent that gray and black plane out there.
translation.ko: 회색과 검은색으로 장식된 비행기를 빌리고 싶은데요

translation.en: I'm sorry, sir. Unfortunately, that's a privately owned aircraft.
I'm not able to just rent you that plane.
Let me see what I can do.
Honestly, how do you ladies make that in that little kitchen back there?
translation.ko: 저 뒤 조그만 주방에서 어떻게 이런 걸 만들죠?

translation.en: We should… we should make a toast.
One glass, one toast. It would make one happy man.
translation.ko: 한 잔에 건배 한 번으로 날 행복하게 해주면

translation.en: It'd mean a lot to me.
-What the hell? Let's do it. [chuckles] -That's the spirit.
To quote the great Joseph Campbell, he said,
"It is by going down into the abyss
where we recover the treasures of life. Where you stumble,
translation.ko: '인생의 보물을 찾을 수 있고 발을 헛디딘 곳에'

translation.en: To the ironic twist of the unknown.
[gasps] All right. All right. Let's sit back down there.
-I'm sorry. I'm a little embarrassed. -Okay. It's okay, honey.
So, I'm gonna let the captain know.
No. Let me just hit the head
and splash some water on my face. I'll be good as gold.
translation.ko: 얼굴에 물 좀 뿌리고 나면 괜찮아질 거예요

translation.en: -Let's get you in. -[Vanderohe] It's right here?
-Yep, right there. That's it, right there. -Yeah, okay.
-[flight attendant] You sure you're okay? -I'm fine.
[pilot] Good evening, this is your captain speaking.
We will be beginning our final descent into Mexico City.
I'd like to ask you to please return to your seat and fasten your safety belt.
